message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good starting point.

I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to get at least 60% to make this worth my while. Let's work towards a solution that benefits both of us.
Let's try a 50/50 split.  We both lose money with every passing round, so it's in our best interest to come to an agreement quickly.
